page.title: 08Our work on the farm
page.content: Our dads are glad of our help on the farm.Martin shuts the cows into the field,he scrapes the yard clean and helps with the fencing. David helps with the fencing,puts sacks on a bonfire, sits in the cab and watches the hydraulics and fertiliser as his dad drives. David W. sits in the cab and helps his dad with the pedal work, he sometimes scrapes the cow shed.We get 50 p. a job. We like helping our Dads on the farm and we want to work on a farm when we grow up. The busiest time is harvest when the corn is combined it is a very dusty time.
